feed.title: Lareau Lab
feed.subtitle: The Lareau Laboratory for Computational and Translation Immunology is housed in the csBio Program at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, New York, NY.

entry.title: Emerging Leader in Computational Oncology
entry.content: Caleb is named an Emerging Leader in Computational Oncology by Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Awardees took place in a two day symposium in New York hosted by faculty in the Computational Oncology program.
entry.summary: Caleb is named an Emerging Leader in Computational Oncology by Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Awardees took place in a two day symposium in New York hosted by faculty in the Computational Oncology program.

entry.title: New preprint on mtDNA variation
entry.content: A new preprint outlining a potential role for synonymous variation in the mitochondrial genome just dropped on bioRxiv. Check out a summary of the work in a tweetorial here!
entry.summary: A new preprint outlining a potential role for synonymous variation in the mitochondrial genome just dropped on bioRxiv. Check out a summary of the work in a tweetorial here!

entry.title: NHGRI Research Training Meeting
entry.content: Supported by our K99/R00, the lab takes place in the NHGRI Research Training and Career Development Annual Meeting in Salt Lake City.
entry.summary: Supported by our K99/R00, the lab takes place in the NHGRI Research Training and Career Development Annual Meeting in Salt Lake City.
